LABEL: 0x2C6
STRING: The <SHEEP III> had been triaged.

LABEL: 0x2F3
STRING: It was more efficient to prioritize responding to the catastrophe on the ground over a costly undersea rescue.

LABEL: 0x34B
STRING: Although there was the question of how ethical it was,

LABEL: 0x38D
STRING: a desire for efficiency was unavoidable in today's expansive society.

LABEL: 0x47F
STRING: And either way, there was only so much we could do inside the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x4DC
STRING: We couldn't contact the surface.

LABEL: 0x50A
STRING: Either they were ignoring our calls or their communication equipment had been damaged by the flare.

LABEL: 0x56A
STRING: Or, perhaps there was still a fault on our side...

LABEL: 0x5AF
STRING: We tried every possible way to re-establish communication.

LABEL: 0x5EF
STRING: While I reviewed the system from scratch and checked for errors,

LABEL: 0x64D
STRING: Tokiwa looked for hardware problems and went over the connections.

LABEL: 0x68D
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x761
STRING: 「It's no use. As far as I can tell, there are no apparent problems.」

LABEL: 0x7BE
STRING: 「Same here. If we can't establish a connection in this situation, then there's nothing we can do...」

LABEL: 0x88A
STRING: 「No way...」

LABEL: 0x8AB
STRING: We couldn't restore it...

LABEL: 0x8D1
STRING: I didn't want to sound weak, but...

LABEL: 0x939
STRING: I naturally turned to look at her.

LABEL: 0x96F
STRING: In the corner of the wheelhouse, a girl stood quietly with her shoulders against the wall.

LABEL: 0x9AD
STRING: Noticing my gaze, Reiri shrugged.

LABEL: 0xA4F
STRING: 「...It's unfortunate.」

LABEL: 0xA6F
STRING: 「I'm no longer doing anything to prevent us from reaching the surface.」

LABEL: 0xACC
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0xAEE
STRING: 「I guess I'm asking for the impossible, even if it's you.」

LABEL: 0xBA2
STRING: 「...What did you say, you bastard?」

LABEL: 0xBF9
STRING: Reiri's eyebrows twitched.

LABEL: 0xC1F
STRING: 「Well, if you're not the one who set this up, then there's no helping it.」

LABEL: 0xC65
STRING: 「We've been trying to restore the comms, but we're at our limit――」

LABEL: 0xD15
STRING: 「Shut up.」

LABEL: 0xD2B
STRING: 「Just because I wasn't the one who set it up doesn't mean I can't restore it.」

LABEL: 0xDDE
STRING: 「Actually, there's no way the comms won't be restored if I'm working on it...!」

LABEL: 0xE43
STRING: As she spoke, she tapped the floor with her shoes.

LABEL: 0xE81
STRING: ...Could it be that Reiri was a little angry?

LABEL: 0xEC7
STRING: 「We're no good... sorry.」

LABEL: 0xF0E
STRING: 「You think you're no good?」

LABEL: 0xF38
STRING: 「What's with the "sorry?" What are you assuming here?」

LABEL: 0xF73
STRING: 「But, we can't do what we can't do...」

LABEL: 0xFB4
STRING: 「You sure love going on about what you can and can't do.」

LABEL: 0x1045
STRING: 「Hey, kimono!」

LABEL: 0x1082
STRING: Reiri briskly walked over to Tokiwa while calling out to her.

LABEL: 0x10BC
STRING: She glared at her blank face.

LABEL: 0x11C9
STRING: 「I've memorized the configuration chart for the hardware here.」

LABEL: 0x1205
STRING: 「Check it over again according to what I tell you.」

LABEL: 0x12F8
STRING: 「Roger!」

LABEL: 0x1357
STRING: 「Katagiri!」

LABEL: 0x139D
STRING: 「Y-Yes?」

LABEL: 0x13C6
STRING: 「There's a hole in the security system. I'll work it out, so you check the bare program.」

LABEL: 0x148F
STRING: 「Don't underestimate me...」

LABEL: 0x14CE
STRING: Reiri reached for the control panel as she barked instructions.

LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: She took out the physical keyboard and stroked the keys with her fingertips.

LABEL: 0x1548
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x15CE
STRING: 「I was the one who built the core system of the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x161A
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0x16A0
STRING: 「I'll show you the difference between us.」

LABEL: 0x16CD
STRING: The girl licked her lips and smiled.

LABEL: 0x16F3
STRING: But... this high school student was the one who had built the system that was the heart of ROMLES' latest submarine...?

LABEL: 0x1757
STRING: That was unbelievable, no matter how you looked at it.

LABEL: 0x1787
STRING: If what Reiri was saying was true,

LABEL: 0x17DD
STRING: then the laboratory I worked in, and even its professors, were all working as her hands and feet.

LABEL: 0x1827
STRING: There was no way something like that could happen.

LABEL: 0x1871
STRING: ...However.

LABEL: 0x189A
STRING: 「Once we're sure the connections are good, the next step is checking the controls.」

LABEL: 0x18E7
STRING: Her fingers hit the keyboard at a tremendous speed while she gave instructions to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x1931
STRING: It was said that the genius hackers in B-movies were far removed from reality, but she was more like those works of fiction, if anything.

LABEL: 0x19A8
STRING: There were multiple editors open on the display.

LABEL: 0x19D6
STRING: The program code displayed on each flowed at an alarming speed.

LABEL: 0x1A26
STRING: ...There was no doubting her skills and knowledge.

LABEL: 0x1AC0
STRING: 「...All right.」

LABEL: 0x1ADA
STRING: 「Katagiri. Security's off.」

LABEL: 0x1B65
STRING: 「I'm tired... The rest is up to you.」

LABEL: 0x1B94
STRING: 「G-Got it.」

LABEL: 0x1C1A
STRING: 「Kimono, the library. Let's see how far we can get with the equipment over there.」

LABEL: 0x1D18
STRING: 「Roger!」

LABEL: 0x1D76
STRING: Reiri placed a hand on my shoulder and left gallantly.

LABEL: 0x1DB6
STRING: ...It was a complete defeat.

LABEL: 0x1DD2
STRING: Seeing the huge gap between me and her, a young girl, was... depressing, to say the least.

LABEL: 0x1E28
STRING: But, this was no time to dwell on such petty pride.

LABEL: 0x1E6E
STRING: I would do what I could.

LABEL: 0x1F10
STRING: ...Several hours of struggling ensued.

LABEL: 0x1F30
STRING: The three of us re-examined the system configuration from scratch, with Reiri taking the lead.

LABEL: 0x1F82
STRING: We stripped the <SHEEP III> system bare by every conceivable mean at our disposal.

LABEL: 0x1FD7
STRING: Conversely, there were no longer any means left to take.

LABEL: 0x2013
STRING: The fact that Reiri had built the ship's core system was probably not an exaggeration.

LABEL: 0x2076
STRING: True to her words, she entered every system, and when an anomaly was detected, she corrected it accurately.

LABEL: 0x20D2
STRING: As long as she was there, even this hopeless situation could be dealt with――

LABEL: 0x2118
STRING: However, that naive assumption ended up betraying us yet again.

LABEL: 0x216A
STRING: Eventually, her hands stopped.

LABEL: 0x218C
STRING: There was nothing more we could do.

LABEL: 0x244F
STRING: 「...I'm hungry.」

LABEL: 0x2520
STRING: It was close to 21:00 already.

LABEL: 0x2542
STRING: Everyone present silently sympathized with Tokiwa's proclamation of hunger.

LABEL: 0x258C
STRING: Reiri, who was sitting on the floor exhausted and hanging her head, raised her hand in agreement.

LABEL: 0x2642
STRING: 「I see the motion has passed by a majority vote.」

LABEL: 0x266E
STRING: 「Let's adopt the "I'm hungry" movement and do something about it right away.」

LABEL: 0x26C0
STRING: 「I guess I'll have to give it my all again... Slurpgunman Tokiwa of the Wilds.」

LABEL: 0x2725
STRING: 「Are you an idiot...?」

LABEL: 0x2750
STRING: 「No, a beauty.」

LABEL: 0x2777
STRING: ...Did she forget what we just talked about?

LABEL: 0x27C3
STRING: The creatures in this area were infected by <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x27F9
STRING: To catch them and eat them... did she forget what she herself said about leucochloridium?

LABEL: 0x285D
STRING: Unlike the rest of us, who usually tried to let Tokiwa's comments go unanswered,

LABEL: 0x28AF
STRING: only Reiri, the newest addition to the group, was sincerely interjecting.

LABEL: 0x28EB
STRING: She still didn't know how futile it was to retort against a natural idiot...

LABEL: 0x2937
STRING: Unable to bear it any longer, Yukari stepped in between them.

LABEL: 0x29CC
STRING: 「...We do need to eat something, even if it isn't deep-sea creatures.」

LABEL: 0x2A12
STRING: 「If we go to the warehouse, there should still be some food left.」

LABEL: 0x2A4E
STRING: 「There's not much in the way of variety, but I can guarantee the taste and safety.」

LABEL: 0x2AF9
STRING: 「Oh, and――」

LABEL: 0x2B15
STRING: 「Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x2B8C
STRING: 「...Umm, do you still have <Alice> on you? Just in case.」

LABEL: 0x2BDB
STRING: Reiri shook her still-hanging head.

LABEL: 0x2CE0
STRING: 「It seems that <Alice's> lethality against normal bacteria is extremely high...」

LABEL: 0x2D38
STRING: 「Even if <Alice> is infected and cultivated, it will die soon after. It's impossible to keep it and carry it with you for long to begin with.」

LABEL: 0x2E07
STRING: 「If it were that easy to isolate the virus in the first place, ROMLES wouldn't have locked her away like a treasure, would they?」

LABEL: 0x2E80
STRING: She was right.

LABEL: 0x2E9A
STRING: Reiri spread her arms as if to show her innocence.

LABEL: 0x2ECE
STRING: Considering everything that had happened so far, I had a hard time trusting her. That didn't mean that she was lying, however.

LABEL: 0x2F34
STRING: So you couldn't carry <Alice> with you...

LABEL: 0x2FA0
STRING: I looked at Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x302C
STRING: 「...Indeed.」

LABEL: 0x3048
STRING: 「That's where the difficulty in researching <Alice> stems from. The virus itself is not easily obtainable.」

LABEL: 0x30B8
STRING: 「It's hard to imagine that they'd have it hidden or stored somewhere.」

LABEL: 0x31FE
STRING: 「...I see.」

LABEL: 0x321C
STRING: 「I thought it would serve as a countermeasure against <COOS> if you did have it...」

LABEL: 0x32DB
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san, please come with me.」

LABEL: 0x3309
STRING: 「You seem to be able to see it.」

LABEL: 0x33AB
STRING: 「If that's all right with you.」

LABEL: 0x33D4
STRING: ――She could see it.

LABEL: 0x347C
STRING: Right, Tokiwa might be able to see <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x3572
STRING: It was Tokiwa who had noticed <COOS> before anyone else in front of the bridge earlier.

LABEL: 0x35C8
STRING: If anything, she detected it even before any light was emitted.

LABEL: 0x3612
STRING: I was not entirely sure if she really "saw" it or sensed it in some other manner, but...

LABEL: 0x3662
STRING: She was the sister of the one and only <Alice>-carrier, Hikari, if nothing else.

LABEL: 0x3725
STRING: I didn't know if that had anything to do with it... but it was hard to believe that it didn't.

LABEL: 0x38CC
STRING: 「Well, then――」

LABEL: 0x3927
STRING: Yukari and Tokiwa headed for the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x3953
STRING: Hiragino said he was going to go check on Hikari and left for the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x3989
STRING: Reiri looked completely exhausted, so Touri and I decided to stay with her in the wheelhouse until she regained her strength.

LABEL: 0x39EF
STRING: Like a doll made of cloth and cotton, she sat balanced against the wall and floor.

LABEL: 0x3A3B
STRING: She must have been like that for at least ten minutes now.

LABEL: 0x3AD9
STRING: When we headed to the lobby with the eventually-mobile Reiri, Yukari and Tokiwa had just returned themselves.

LABEL: 0x3B41
STRING: Piles of food were scattered around haphazardly.

LABEL: 0x3B69
STRING: They never encountered <COOS> either, according to a proud Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3CB8
STRING: 「You can leave the cooking to us.」

LABEL: 0x3CED
STRING: 「No, wait――」

LABEL: 0x3D7B
STRING: 「Please go and fetch Hiragino-sensei, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x3DB8
STRING: Yukari flashed a broad smile in my direction.

LABEL: 0x3DDE
STRING: It looked like I had no room for arguing, unfortunately.

LABEL: 0x4109
STRING: 「Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x4123
STRING: 「――Dinner's ready.」

LABEL: 0x413F
STRING: I called out to the emergency room without bothering to knock.

LABEL: 0x4184
STRING: 「...Right.」

LABEL: 0x41A3
STRING: A distracted reply.

LABEL: 0x41C1
STRING: I waited a few seconds, but there was no sign of him coming out.

LABEL: 0x41EF
STRING: Wait... Was this one of those moments where you responded without really listening?

LABEL: 0x423F
STRING: I knew because I was a person prone to doing that myself, but Hiragino had definitely not listened to a word I'd just said.

LABEL: 0x4295
STRING: He just responded automatically because he heard his name... Get a hold of yourself, my man.

LABEL: 0x42DF
STRING: I barged into the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x43C6
STRING: Hiragino was sitting at his desk, staring at the PC monitor vacantly.

LABEL: 0x4418
STRING: I approached him and made footsteps in the same manner that Yukari would, but he didn't seem to take notice.

LABEL: 0x447C
STRING: ...I guess he was concentrating, or rather, in deep thought.

LABEL: 0x44C4
STRING: What the hell was bothering him that much?

LABEL: 0x4514
STRING: 「How's she doing?」

LABEL: 0x45A0
STRING: 「...No signs of waking up.」

LABEL: 0x45CA
STRING: 「Though, the blood transfusion itself was a success. She's recovering well.」

LABEL: 0x460C
STRING: 「Judging by the readings, her stamina is returning. In other words... her not waking up is due to something else.」

LABEL: 0x4671
STRING: Something else... He made it sound ambiguous, but I knew he meant <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x46B9
STRING: It was an illness that destroyed your internal clock and kept you asleep.

LABEL: 0x46E9
STRING: 「You'll stay asleep if you get infected by <Alice>, right?」

LABEL: 0x479D
STRING: 「...Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x47B7
STRING: 「Your regular sleep cycle completely disappears.」

LABEL: 0x47F3
STRING: 「I don't know how long you'll sleep for. It could be a week, it could be a year. Or more.」

LABEL: 0x4866
STRING: Hiragino spoke in a vacant tone like his mind was elsewhere.

LABEL: 0x48B2
STRING: Maybe he was simply tired...

LABEL: 0x494E
STRING: 「There's this disorder called Kleine-Levin syndrome.」

LABEL: 0x4986
STRING: 「There are records of the affected patients sleeping for over six months.」

LABEL: 0x49D6
STRING: 「In that sense, it's not strange at all...」

LABEL: 0x4A1F
STRING: 「You were researching <Alice> now that I think about it, weren't you?」

LABEL: 0x4ADF
STRING: 「Hm? Yeah... That said, I was only briefly involved.」

LABEL: 0x4B20
STRING: 「Were there any successful treatments or anything like that, for example?」

LABEL: 0x4BCC
STRING: 「Treatment, huh...?」

LABEL: 0x4BEF
STRING: Hiragino crossed his arms and sank into deep thought.

LABEL: 0x4C30
STRING: 「As far as treatment goes,

LABEL: 0x4C56
STRING: since <Alice> itself uses reverse transcriptase to intervene on the DNA level to begin with, there are only two ways to do it.」

LABEL: 0x4D28
STRING: 「That is, either keep to symptomatic treatments, or gene therapy.」

LABEL: 0x4D6C
STRING: 「If it's before the onset of the illness, we could use reverse transcriptase inhibitors, which are also used in the treatment of HIV――」

LABEL: 0x4DED
STRING: 「But if it's not...」

LABEL: 0x4E22
STRING: He spat out the words, perhaps aware of how powerless he was.

LABEL: 0x4E54
STRING: Gene therapy, or otherwise symptomatic treatment...

LABEL: 0x4E88
STRING: Given the facilities inside the <SHEEP III>, it was not realistically possible to provide a fundamental treatment.

LABEL: 0x4EE7
STRING: Hiragino let out a long sigh, clapped his hands together, and stood up.

LABEL: 0x4F99
STRING: 「That said, there's hope in symptomatic treatment.」

LABEL: 0x4FCD
STRING: 「――Look at this.」

LABEL: 0x5010
STRING: Multiple chemical formulas were shown on the computer.

LABEL: 0x503C
STRING: Alphabets connected by lines were displayed.

LABEL: 0x507A
STRING: 「Are these... some sort of components?」

LABEL: 0x50B3
STRING: 「It's amphetamine.」

LABEL: 0x50D5
STRING: 「This one's methylphenidate.」

LABEL: 0x5105
STRING: 「They're stimulant components, so to speak.」

LABEL: 0x513C
STRING: 「Stimulants...」

LABEL: 0x515E
STRING: What was he going to do with those?

LABEL: 0x518E
STRING: From <Alice> to stimulants... I couldn't follow the conversation at all.

LABEL: 0x5231
STRING: 「So, what about these stimulants?」

LABEL: 0x5278
STRING: 「These are the components of Reiri-kun's medicine.」

LABEL: 0x52C5
STRING: 「Why is she taking something like this...?」

LABEL: 0x536F
STRING: 「That said, "stimulant" isn't the best way to describe them.」

LABEL: 0x53B5
STRING: 「In medicine, drugs with potent stimulant effects are also used to help people with sleep disorders.」

LABEL: 0x5407
STRING: 「For example, the administration of amine-acting stimulants such as amphetamine

LABEL: 0x545B
STRING: produces a suprachiasmatic nucleus-independent rhythm in the body.」

LABEL: 0x54B0
STRING: 「The suprachiasmatic nucleus is the pacemaker of circadian behavioral rhythms...」

LABEL: 0x5572
STRING: 「That's right. Basically, mammals, including humans, live in a 24-hour rhythm in a way that depends on the suprachiasmatic nucleus.」

LABEL: 0x55E4
STRING: 「For example, rats who are given amphetamine in their drinking water exhibit free-running rhythms with cycles longer than 30 hours,

LABEL: 0x5648
STRING: even when placed in light and dark conditions.」

LABEL: 0x568C
STRING: 「In fact, these drugs are used in the treatment of diseases that cause sudden sleep, like narcolepsy.」

LABEL: 0x56F5
STRING: The internal clock destroyed by <Alice>――

LABEL: 0x572B
STRING: That was the reason why your regular sleep rhythm disappeared, and you couldn't wake up.

LABEL: 0x5779
STRING: But what if you could create a rhythm in your body, regardless of your destroyed biological clock?

LABEL: 0x57D9
STRING: 「So that means...」

LABEL: 0x586B
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x5883
STRING: 「This is the perfect symptomatic treatment for <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x58CE
STRING: If we administered Hikari some of Reiri's medicine, we could wake her up...!

LABEL: 0x5925
STRING: 「Well, we can't be certain yet.」

LABEL: 0x5951
STRING: 「I'll give it a try later.」

LABEL: 0x5979
STRING: 「...Now then.」

LABEL: 0x59F0
STRING: 「Why don't we go eat for now?」
